DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, efficacy, and duration of effect of a single administration of Anecortave Acetate Depot for treatment of elevated intraocular pressure (IOP) in patients with open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: Anecortave Acetate in Patients With Open-angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years of age or older with openangle glaucoma. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Patients with openangle glaucoma with a pseudoexfoliation or pigment dispersion component. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
